segments.text: I keep looking out the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so peaceful and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and well-tended bushes, all calm and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the unfolding chaos inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily pouring onto the floor, unchecked and unheeded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are so absorbed in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sad that such a tranquil scene exists just inches away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss is on the verge of collapsing into mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness is almost heartbreaking in its completeness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just continues her task, completely isolated from the developing problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her, or somehow intervene in this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can only observe this unfortunate sequence of events.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sun is shining brightly outside, completely unaware of the indoor drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a play where the audience knows the ending, but the actors don't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A quiet disaster in a sunny kitchen, itâ€™s truly a peculiar sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
